game.name: The Corner Cafe
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The Corner Cafe is a cozy(ish) cafe simulator set in a retro futuristic mythical Ireland in the year 2160. Play as Dan, the new owner of The Corner Cafe, the last independent cafe in Galway City. It is up to you to create an oasis of community in this dystopia...
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Corner Cafe is a cozy(ish) cafe simulator set in a retro futuristic mythical Ireland in the year 2160. Play as Dan, the new owner of The Corner Cafe, the last independent cafe in Galway City. It is up to you to create an oasis of community in this dystopia...
